channel.title: Need a coder to make me a training arena in central varrock!
channel.description:
Please, I have been wondering if theres a good enough coder! I have been thinking for some time...what if there was a huge training base to train mage,prayer,att,def,str,rcing,wcing, and fletching, and fishing in one training arena.
I realise, this is asking alot, but it would mean alot.
I would be really grateful if someone wrote up a code, easy to know where to put, so i could have a training room (i dont want to use a command to get there), my server players could use!.
